AUTHOR: W4mp3
SHORT: An Extension to the sfx cog of irdumb, tmerc and flapjax
DESCRIPTION:
Extension to the [p]sfx thing by irdumb, tmerc and flabjax. Allows you to change TTS language on the fly.
'list' - show all available languages
'current' - Current TTS language
NAME: ttslang
INSTALL_MSG: Thanks for installing the ttslang extension of W4mp3sBigCogs. You can now change the language of the tts by typing [p]ttslang <language>. Example: [p]ttslang de
